pullRequest.title: Template the project Ballerina.toml file
pullRequest.bodyText:
Purpose

Templating the Ballerina.toml of microgateway project. This will avoid confusions when trying to add/update elements such as dependencies and libs into this file programmatically.
Issues

Fixes #1007
Fixes #1101
Automation tests

Unit tests added: No
Integration tests added: No

Tested environments

MacOs

Maintainers: Check before merge

 Assigned 'Type' label
 Assigned the project
 Validated respective github issues
 Assigned milestone to the github issue(s)

commit.message:
cli: build: Template ballerina toml

Fixes #1007
Fixes #1101

static Ballerina.toml file is removed as it is not required anymore.
Content will be populated using the mustache template.
We still don't use the complete definition mode for ballerina
platform libraries. Therefore most attributes of BallerinaLibrary
model is kept in default (empty) values.

cli: build: Template project version

project version can't be hardcoded in the template. This cause
issues when releasing and updating the project version in pom files.

Maven writes it's maven artifact details into pom.properties in each
build. Therefore we can use that pom file the get maven project
details during the runtime without much trouble.

nodes.bodyText: lets remove the above gette and setters

commit.message:
cli: build: Remove unwanted fields

removed fields are not yet supported by ballerina.
Merge branch 'master' of github.com:wso2/product-microgateway into template-toml
